loops

Class Loops

  • java.lang.Object
    • loops.Loops

  • public class Loops
extends java.lang.Object
    Loops class contains several static utility methods defined using loops.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Loops()

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static long evaluateComplexExp(java.lang.String str)
      Method to compute an arthmatic expression and return final result.
      static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> organizeSeats(java.util.ArrayList<Student> studentList)
      This method takes all the Students for a course in a section as a list of student objects and then computes the possible combinations in which the students can be arranged.
      static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> restrictedOrders(java.util.ArrayList<Student> studentList, java.util.ArrayList<Student> restrictedList)
      This method takes all the Students for a course in a section as a list of student objects and then computes the possible combinations in which the students can be arranged in a restricted order for the students provided in the second argument.
      static int sumOfOdd(int n)
      Returns sum of first n positive odd numbers starting from 1.

    • Method Detail

      • sumOfOdd

        public static int sumOfOdd(int n)
        Returns sum of first n positive odd numbers starting from 1.
        Parameters:
        n - Number of odd numbers Sum=1+3+5+......nth odd number
        Returns:
        Sum of n odd numbers

      • organizeSeats

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> organizeSeats(java.util.ArrayList<Student> studentList)
        This method takes all the Students for a course in a section as a list of student objects and then computes the possible combinations in which the students can be arranged.
        Parameters:
        studentList - List of student to be organized.
        Returns:
        All possible combinations of seating arrangements computed.

      • restrictedOrders

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> restrictedOrders(java.util.ArrayList<Student> studentList,
                                                                     java.util.ArrayList<Student> restrictedList)
        This method takes all the Students for a course in a section as a list of student objects and then computes the possible combinations in which the students can be arranged in a restricted order for the students provided in the second argument.
        Parameters:
        studentList - List of student to be organized.
        restrictedList - All students who cannot sit adjacent to any other in the list.
        Returns:
        All possible combinations of restricted seating arrangements computed.

      • evaluateComplexExp

        public static long evaluateComplexExp(java.lang.String str)
        Method to compute an arthmatic expression and return final result. In case of a illegal expression format this method throws error.
        Parameters:
        str - Expression to be evaluated.
        Returns:
        Result of the evaluated expression
